alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:29PM CDT until July 01 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Central Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White House, or 12 miles east of Springfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Springfield, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland, Orlinda, Mitchellville, Bethpage, Oak Grove, Bledsoe Creek State Park and Cottontown. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 98 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
